# Load packages

```{r}
library(gt)
library(reactable)
library(reactablefmtr)
library(tinytable)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
library(gtExtras)
base_tab <- dplyr::tibble(x = seq(1, 100, length.out = 6)) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    x_unscaled = x,
    x_scaled = x / max(x) * 100
  ) %>%
  gt()

base_tab %>%
  gt_plt_bar_pct(
    column = x_unscaled,
    scaled = TRUE,
    fill = "forestgreen"
  ) %>%
  gt_plt_bar_pct(
    column = x_scaled,
    scaled = FALSE,
    labels = TRUE
  )
```
